name: My Crazy Cake Maker Mania
description:
Play amazing Crazy Cake Maker Game! Make your perfect cake and create decoration. There are so many beautiful variety and collection. It's amazing one off the best cooking game. Bake a Delicious cake that everyone will love! Have fun while learning a new cake recipe.

===========
Top Features:
===========
- Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
- Bake the chocolate cake mixture in the oven.
- Learn to cook delicate cakes step by step.
- It's amazing beautiful graphics interface.
- Choose from a variety of ingredients.
- Supported all device.

Have fun to cook yummy cakes. So are you ready for play this game?

Download Now...
